reviews.name: Creative Labs Live! USB Cam Chat HD
reviews.reviewText: No lagging pictures like some web cams have. Sound quality is the same as a phone. It is simple, just plug in and call someone via a messenger service. I used mine with Facebook within a minute of getting it out of the box.
reviews.title: Great Picture

reviews.name: Creative Labs Live! USB Cam Chat HD
reviews.reviewText: I love the audio and picture quality of this webcam. It's definitely worth the extra few dollars. I use it for Skype all the time.
reviews.title: a great web cam

reviews.name: Creative Labs Live! USB Cam Chat HD
reviews.reviewText: This is a very nice compact webcam, for the price it would be hard to find better.
reviews.title: Awesome

reviews.name: Creative Labs Live! USB Cam Chat HD
reviews.reviewText: Got the camera for a family member. She installed it and had it up and running in a matter of minutes. The audio and video worked well.
reviews.title: Great camera and easy to set up

reviews.name: Creative Labs Live! USB Cam Chat HD
reviews.reviewText: Good value for the money. A step below some of the more expensive Logitech webcams, but it works well with Skype. It has user control over the white balance which I used to get more natural colors for the indoor lighting conditions (diffused daylight). The webcam is advertised as HD, but the image quality is not HD with normal light, which is to be expected from the cheap optics.
reviews.title: Good value.
